sections.heading: 840 through 847 of this title and Section 2357
sections.text: 81 of Title 68 of the Oklahoma Statutes shall be known and may be cited as the “Oklahoma Local Development and Enterprise Zone Incentive Leverage Act”.Added by Laws 2000, c. 339, § 9, eff. July 1, 2000. Amended by Laws 2008, c. 217, § 1, emerg. eff. May
